text: Godfrey Gao (; 22 September 1984 â€“ 27 November 2019) was a Taiwanese-Canadian model and actor. He was the first Asian model to appear in a campaign for Louis Vuitton. He was known for his roles as Magnus Bane in the 2013 movie version of The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones and for his leading role in Chinese television series Remembering Lichuan. Gao died of a heart attack while filming a movie in Ningbo, Zhejiang on 27 November 2019 at the age of 35. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1984 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Taiwanese actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian models Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Godfrey Gao
